attributes.action: Make the official Midland Combination restore the 'S' to Archdales '73's name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Archdales '73 are a famous Midland Combination League football club, yet the official website of the league they play in cannot even get their name right. It is not Archdale '73 it is Archdales '73.
This is important, let us correct this travesty.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
